title: KiMxCT
author: KiMxCT
created_time: March 28, 2023, 03:44:01 AMLast edit: April 10, 2023, 01:30:22 PM by KiMxCT
content: About CoinTAFTIntroduction The name CoinTAFT, TAFT itself is the pronunciation of the word Tough which means tough!CoinTAFT is a CPU mineable cryptocurrency and open source software developed under MIT license. It can be mined on GPU too, but CPU mining is more efficient.BlockChain Properties:Coin Name: CoinTAFTCoin Symbol: TAFTReward : 5000 TAFTBlock time: 120 secondsPoW algorithm: GhostRiderReward distribution:50% Miner – 45% Smartnode – 5% Development fee.CoinTAFT Resources:Github: https://github.com/TaftProject/cointaftWebsites: https://cointaft.com/Explorer: https://explorer.cointaft.comDiscords: https://discord.gg/XcgXswmznJMiningASIC and FPGA resistance through the GhostRider algorithm.Mining Pool:https://miningpoolstats.stream/cointaftDownload QT WalletWindows : https://github.com/TaftProject/cointaft/releases/download/v0.0.1.01/cointaft-win-0.0.1.01.zipUbuntu 18: https://github.com/TaftProject/cointaft/releases/download/v0.0.1.01/cointaft-ubuntu18-0.0.1.01.tar.gzUbuntu 20: https://github.com/TaftProject/cointaft/releases/download/v0.0.1.01/cointaft-ubuntu20-0.0.1.01.tar.gzMacos : https://github.com/TaftProject/cointaft/releases/download/v0.0.1.01/Cointaft-Qt.dmg https://github.com/TaftProject/cointaft/releases/download/v0.0.1.01/cointaft-macos-0.0.1.01.tar.gz

comments.author: lijingang
comments.body: What is the feature of this project, or is it just pure copy and paste code, just making junk money is not good.

comments.author: Bowser7
comments.body: Hey!We added CoinTaft to our Mining Pool: https://bowserlab.ddns.net:8080How to connect:-a gr -o stratum+tcp://bowserlab.ddns.net:3033 -u <WALLET_ADDRESS> -p c=TAFTHappy mining!

comments.author: Angellutz
comments.body: Hello, it looks like a great project to start mining according to what I have read in the whitepaper. I look forward to getting incentives from these coins. The difficulty seems to be low for now which is normal.  The website needs some improvements as the social links won't work correctly.I wish you all a happy mining with this project.

I look forward to getting incentives from these coins. The difficulty seems to be low for now which is normal.  The website needs some improvements as the social links won't work correctly.I wish you all a happy mining with this project.  Are you retarded ?  This is another copy of Raptoreum...Yeah ... I know you are the dev (new account and first post about how cool this project is... what a coincidence   )

I look forward to getting incentives from these coins. The difficulty seems to be low for now which is normal.  The website needs some improvements as the social links won't work correctly.I wish you all a happy mining with this project.  Are you retarded?  This is another copy of Raptoreum...Yeah ... I know you are the dev (new account and first post about how cool this project is... what a coincidence   )Thank you for sharing your thoughts, but you guessed that wrong. Ain't the admin of this coin, I just like how the project presents itself. Sorry to see some pessimistic people in the crypto world. I'm not an expert in this field so I won't say anything else about this coin. I just hope it gets pumped cause I have a lot to sell and I wanna cash out as any human being. Have a great day!

I'm realistic. This project is utter shit (its basiclly clone of raptoreum).Raptoreum at some point gained a bit of attention and its price went up for a moment ...and since that happend we have constant attemtps to make that again with another clone of ratporeum (but of course it always fail).

comments.author: madmartyk
comments.body: Is there a purpose for this coin?

comments.author: scorpio18
comments.body: https://pool.coin-miners.info/site/gomining?algo=gr CoinTAFT has been added to CoinMiners Mining PoolFee: 0.5%Payouts are made automatically every 1 hours for all balances above 0.001, or 0.0001 on Sunday.Stratum settings:Code: xmrig.exe -a gr -o stratum+tcp://eu.coin-miners.info:6511 -u WALLET_ADDRESS -p c=TAFTCode: wildrig.exe -a gr -o stratum+tcp://eu.coin-miners.info:6511 -u WALLET_ADDRESS -p c=TAFTCode: SRBMiner-MULTI.exe --algorithm ghostrider --pool eu.coin-miners.info:6511 --wallet WALLET_ADDRESS --password  c=TAFTIf you want to mine solo add m=solo to the password like this Code:-p c=TAFT,m=soloDiscord channel https://discord.gg/szzvMEBNje

comments.author: AlanJohnson

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added CoinTAFT (TAFT) to http://zpool.ca/algo/ghostrider. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine ghostrider and get paid in TAFT:Code:-a ghostrider -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zpool.ca:5354 -u TAFT_ADDRESS -p c=TAFT Exchange to BTC:Code:-a ghostrider -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zpool.ca:5354 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for ghostrider: 55354
